Text:
Quality? e.g. does the video have any flicker..?

The only things that really make a cam unwatchable imo are noticeable flicker in the video, or audio where you can't understand what they're saying.  Thx.
download the sample in the torrent :)
Yup.... didn't notice that before. I had looked at another release that did not include a sample (Tode's?)

A 5 - its low so you need the volume up
V 8 - not bad for a cam.

is there actualy a way to download just the sample on torrents before downloading the movie file? been downloading for ages but hate the magnet link becoz i cant deselect some files ,if someone can help thanks!!

For D.Robo, go to Get This Torrent, when d/l registers on your Torrent (I use utorrent) right click on Files, highlight everything but sample and Don't Download. When d/l check the sample. Keep up the good work .BONE, appreciated
